name: Drag Racing: Bike Edition
description:
The long-awaited extension of the most popular mobile racing game in the world is finally here!

Diversify your racing experience with 17 extremely fast sport bikes in a new game from the creators of the original Nitro Nation™ Drag Racing - the biggest racing game on mobile with over 70 million players!
Challenge thousands of players in 4 online modes
 Win and get to the top of the global leaderboards
Share your best runs on Facebook and Twitter
 Install performance parts to build the fastest bike
* Go deeper and tune your racing machine for ultimate performance

FEATURES:
Advanced bike physics for the most realistic drag racing on mobile
 Non-linear upgrade paths and addictive tuning options
Multiple online competitions from quick runs to ladder tournaments
 Numerous bikes to ride and upgrade, each with a unique character
COMMUNITY:
Follow http://facebook.com/DragRacingBikes for news and strategy
Visit the official forums at http://www.dragracingforum.net
